Message.Title: Chitownbarber's contributions to this board for
Message.Msg: Even best the most negative poster on this board posts relevant articles, here are chitowns (angry-rain-man) posts for the month courtesey of epicbest: ------------------------------------------------------------- "I want to absorb any good & bad information that affects my position in Nvidia... but what's bad is the regular band of drive-by misfits who would rather taunt, and post redundant, useless, baseless information 24/7." Huh? Let's take a little review of chitownbarber22's own taunting, useless, drive-by contributions to our board, shall we? Here's a compendium of chitownbarber22's posts, for the month of May. "You really need to get a job. I'm sure their is some circus or carnival in this country that's looking for a one man freak show like yourself? -- chitownbarber22, 30-May-12 "Get back into your hole you cockroach." -- chitownbarber22, 29-May-12 "I see another cockroach has slithered out from the sewer." -- chitownbarber22, 29-May-12 "Have you checked your diaper lately?" -- chitownbarber22, 23-May-12 "The only thing going down is your mobile home that's sinking in the mud. Quit being a low-life and get a job so you can pay for your propane tanks you i mbecile." -- chitownbarber22, 23-May-12 "Take a hike and look for a job trailer trash." -- chitownbarber22, 16-May-12 "Rome wasn't built in a day either" I bet the mobile home and trailer park you live in was made in a day." -- chitownbarber22, 15-May-12 "I thought the circus hired you back last week?" -- chitownbarber22, 14-May-12 "Stop your posting and drop your pants for the truck driver that needs servicing. Maybe he will give you a nice tip if you scrub his backside real good?" -- chitownbarber22, 11-May-2012 "They must be nice to let you use a computer while working as a bathroom attendant at the truck stop down the street from your trailer park." -- chitownbarber22, 11-May-2012 "It's a sad day every time you post your blather here. Get out and look for a job you useless loser." -- chitownbarber22, 11-May-2012 "Maybe XC, AMDSH1T and besty finally got a job? I don't know if anybody is that stupid to do so, but you never know?" -- chitownbarber22, 11-May-2012 "Speaking of useless, did the circus hire you back for the summer cleaning cages? -- chitownbarber22, 11-May-2012 "Hey AMDSH1T, I heard the circus has decided to put you on probation and is giving you your job cleaning cages back." -- chitownbarber22, 8-May-2012 "Ho Hum, just another stupid post by AMDSH1T." -- chitownbarber22, 8-May-2012 "He has no honor.> And you have no brains. Get a job. Maybe the circus will hire you back as a freak show act? -- chitownbarber22, 8-May 2012 "I heard they are partial to beef flavored chews, and squeaky toys." -- chitownbarber22, 5-May-2012 "Larry the loser will probably join the band of imbeciles like AMDSH1T, XC, BEASTY, and post endless amounts of nonsense." -- chitownbarber22, 4-May-2012 "Speaking of crappers, what's the over/under on how many lame posts will AMDSH1T dump on this board today?" -- chitownbarber22, 2-May-2012 "Speaking of losers, I wonder how AMDSH1T pays off his mortgage on his mobile home every month when he free-loads at the library all day? -- chitownbarber22, 2-May-2012
